Articles.Content:
Hi all.

Wanted to reshare this as it might be handy.

Rather than a ship model its a save.

Everything is the same as a fresh one, with the only difference being the giant refueling station in orbit.

If you have need for large fuel stocks in orbit but dont want to build it yourself.

The station holds 13386 liquid fuel,16715 oxidizer and 7315 monopropelant.

There are 9 full sized docking ports aswell as 1 baby port for probes, also there is room to store 3 kerbals.

There is no debris in orbit, or other junk around, everything was brought up and put together with deorbitable transports.

Click here for the download, place it in a save folder.

Heres the station with a docked T75.
